name: LIP_AND_ORAL_CAV_2
description: Stores single response data for College of American Pathologists (CAP) form 76029-LIP AND ORAL CAVITY: INCISIONAL BIOPSY, EXCISIONAL BIOPSY, RESECTION.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the result record.

columns.name: PT_FOR_MUC_MAL_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Primary Tumor for Mucosal Malignant Melanoma.
entries: pT3: Mucosal disease
pT4a: Moderately advanced disease. Tumor involving deep soft tissue, cartilage, bone,
pT4b: Very advanced disease. Tumor involving brain, dura, skull base, lower cranial n
